personalDetails.name: Sibeesh Venu
personalDetails.professionalSummary: More than 8 years of experience in Software Development, hands-on with a wide variety of technologies such as Azure Services, Azure DevOps, Azure IoT, Azure Functions, Asp.Net Core, Angular, and other Front-End technologies, SharePoint, Microsoft Flow, Docker, etc. I have experience in working with Monolithic, Microservices, and Cloud-Native Applications. Love to learn new technologies, implement them in projects, and write about them. Believer of “One who stops learning is old”. An engineer by profession and a writer by passion. Author of the book 'Asp Net Core and Azure with Raspberry Pi 4' (https://www.amazon.in/Asp-Net-Core-Azure-Raspberry-Applications/dp/1484264428). Microsoft MVP since 2016 and have written more than 500 blogs.
